overview: Aliye, a young hotel clerk who carries the weight of her name and her life on the streets of a small city, wants to tell her story, which she has never told to anyone, to a "good listener" she discovers behind a curtain one night. As she pulls back the curtains of her story one by one, she constructs a "play" in which the life she lives in empty hotel rooms, on the streets, in her home and the life she imagines blend together. This game will change not only his future but also his past A film by Pelin Esmer
title: O da Bir Şey mi?
